channel.title: Different way of making isInArea thing
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Well, I remember seeing in some code something like [code]isInArea(absX = 500 + 2, absY = 500 - 2);[/code]. Is this better than the boolean isInArea()? And if it is, can someome gimme the correct code >.< lol Thanks. Rep++ to whoever helps!
RuneWings317

item.title: Different way of making isInArea thing
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Ugh, never mind… Lol it’s extremely hard to explain. If you have the Partyroom from Loveandpower, it’s how he handled the partyroom area.

Read full topic

item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

No… It’s more like 1 line of code and that’s about it. And inside the parenthesis is like absX == 50 -2;, absY == 30 +2;); and anything that in between those 2 things are where it is. Get me? :o

@pk2play wrote:

This?

public boolean WHATEVER() { return (this.c.getX() <= 2404) && (this.c.getX() >= 2394) && (this.c.getY() <= 5175) && (this.c.getY() >= 5169); }
